nodes.description: 周末，警方接到报告称在Wattlebridge Road上有一个可疑装置。
nodes.support_text: Bomb disposal officers had been in the area at the weekend responding to reports that a device had been left there. The initial report received by police indicated that a device had been left on the Wattlebridge Road

nodes.description: 军方爆炸物处理小组和警察在周末前往该区域处理这起报告。
nodes.support_text: Bomb disposal officers had been in the area at the weekend responding to reports that a device had been left there.

nodes.description: 经调查，第一个被报告的装置被确认为骗局。
nodes.support_text: The first device was declared a hoax.

nodes.description: 周一上午，一队军方技术官员和警察再次前往现场。
nodes.support_text: the explosion on Monday occurred on the main A3 Cavan Road when a team of Army Technical Officers (ATO) and police attended the scene.

nodes.description: 上午10点35分，当警察和军方人员在现场时，一枚炸弹在主A3 Cavan Road上爆炸。
nodes.support_text: Officers reported the explosion at around 10.35am. ... a team of Army Technical Officers (ATO) and police attended the scene at Wattle Bridge close to Newtownbutler on Monday morning.

nodes.description: 事后，警方官员和政治人物纷纷发表声明，谴责这次袭击并归咎于分裂主义共和军。
nodes.support_text: Deputy Chief Constable Stephen Martin described the attack as 'indiscriminate and reckless'. "We are of the belief that this attack has been carried out by dissident republican groupings...

nodes.description: 有人将一个装置留在了Wattlebridge路上。
nodes.support_text: reports that a device had been left there.

nodes.description: （副总警长）认为其中一个组织是调查的一个很好的起点。
nodes.support_text: I (Deputy Chief Constable Stephen Martin) think one of those groups would be a very good starting point for the investigation

nodes.description: （副总警长）认为可以说他们的活动水平今年有所增加。
nodes.support_text: I (Deputy Chief Constable Stephen Martin) think it is fair to say that their level of activity has increased this year

nodes.description: 他们的活动水平今年有所增加。
nodes.support_text: their level of activity has increased this year

nodes.description: “爱尔兰共和军连续派”宣称对2009年谋杀警官斯蒂芬·卡罗尔的事件负责。
nodes.support_text: The Continuity IRA claimed responsibility for the murder of Constable Stephen Carroll in 2009

nodes.description: “新爱尔兰共和军”今年四月在伦敦德里开枪打死了记者莱拉·麦基。
nodes.support_text: The New IRA shot dead journalist Lyra McKee in Londonderry in April

nodes.description: 攻击者蓄意企图引诱警察和ATO同事进入该区域。
nodes.support_text: 蓄意企图引诱警察和ATO同事进入该区域。

nodes.description: 攻击者的意图是谋杀警察和军队人员，该装置被设计用于此目的。
nodes.support_text: 引诱警察的最终目的是为了谋杀他们。该装置被设计意图是杀死警察和军队人员。

nodes.description: 首批到场警员的行动最终导致了没有严重伤亡的结果。
nodes.support_text: 首批到场警员的行动最终导致了没有严重伤亡的结果。

nodes.description: 马丁承认并赞扬了现场警员和军队人员的勇敢与奉献。
nodes.support_text: 马丁表示他希望并愿意承认和赞扬警员的勇敢。马丁承认并赞扬了现场警员和军队人员的勇敢与奉献。

nodes.description: 一名在职警察在车下发现了诡雷炸弹。
nodes.support_text: 一名在职警察在车下发现了诡雷炸弹。

nodes.description: 持异见者共和党人策划了七月的袭击事件。
nodes.support_text: 持异见者共和党人策划了七月的袭击事件。
